sentence.Network_en: They now take extra steps to verify the creditworthiness of customers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们现在又采取额外措施来核实客户的信用度。

sentence.Network_en: These positions now endanger the creditworthiness of the European banking system.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些状况现在威胁到欧洲银行体系的信用.

sentence.Network_en: Credit derivatives allow investors to make bets on the creditworthiness of baskets of corporate debt.
sentence.Network_cn: 信贷衍生品允许投资者对一揽子企业债券的信用程度进行下注.

the interbank-funds market has seized up and even the most creditworthy corporate and financial firms are paying punitive rates .同基金市场已经停滞，即便是最有信誉的公司和金融机构也在支付惩罚性的费用。

entry.def: A creditworthy person or organization is one who can safely be lent money or allowed to have goods on credit, for example because in the past they have always paid back what they owe.

example.ex: Building societies make loans to creditworthy customers.
example.tran: 购房互助协会为信誉良好的客户提供贷款。

means.word_mean: 1. trustworthiness with money as based on a person's credit history; a general qualification for borrowing
